column4: hello, anybosy knows how to dual boot linux ubuntu and winxp MCE on the same HD wiothout changing the Windows MBR?
and as i use a laptop, i have no floppy disk
can GRUB boot loader be installed on a flash drive?
uhm...I don't think you need Windows drivers for Ubuntu?
im sorry, I'm not quite understanding your questino
oh, like run an EXE file? Wine
Windows drivers won't work at all on Ubuntu, however
anyway, what were you asking about earlier?
well, I guess you could have your NTLDR chainload grub?
well, what's wrong with GRUB on your MBR then?
